Desc.entry: Falun Dafa also known as Falun Gong is what the Chinese call a traditional cultivation practice. Practitioners cultivate themselves mentally, spiritually and physically by repeating five tranquil exercises and always behaving according to the principle of Truthfulness, Compassion and Tolerance. Body-mind-spirit development is an important aspect of oriental culture. Falun Dafa is neither religion nor a political movement having no desire for ritual or temporal power. Exercises are carried out to quiet Chinese music which helps with timing and focus. Anyone can participate.
